body_html:
GPUs currently support only tf.half (aka tf.float16), tf.float32 and tf.float64. Variables of other types cannot be placed on GPU.

This should probably be better documented. However, it is intended at this time.

(For details, see variable_ops.cc and register_types.h)

Hope that helps!
body_text:
GPUs currently support only tf.half (aka tf.float16), tf.float32 and tf.float64. Variables of other types cannot be placed on GPU.
This should probably be better documented. However, it is intended at this time.
(For details, see variable_ops.cc and register_types.h)
Hope that helps!
body:
GPUs currently support only `tf.half` (aka `tf.float16`), `tf.float32` and `tf.float64`. Variables of other types cannot be placed on GPU.

This should probably be better documented. However, it is intended at this time.

(For details, see [`variable_ops.cc`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/2c8d0dc/tensorflow/core/kernels/variable_ops.cc#L66) and [`register_types.h`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/2c8d0dc/tensorflow/core/framework/register_types.h#L172))

Hope that helps!
